title: Beauty is an Effort!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Nico-chan, your skin is so beautiful<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Obviously! Nico is the galaxy’s number one idol after all! …. Or so I’d like to say, but I also put a lot of effort into it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>May I ask what kinds of things do you do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I tried cucumber face packs, but also, do not get fixated on school idol information and go to sleep early! It’s the most important part<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Staying up late is the enemy of skins huh. But, is that it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>“That’s it?” you say!? You! Do you not understand how hard it is to stop chasing after the latest school idol information!? Everyday across the country new school idols are born…. If you take your eyes off of them a little bit, it’s over!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Th-, that’s right huh. I don’t really follow that kind of information, so I don’t quite get it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I also follow you, Karin….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I follow magazine models’ articles! Tell Nico about the beauty method mentioned in the magazine the other day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
